name: Roast Turkey Salad
description: This Roast Turkey Salad is the perfect combination for anyone looking for a healthy, low-carb, and low-sugar meal. Full of freshness and flavor, it brings together the best of healthified recipes to create a dish that's not only delicious but also good for you.

recipeInstructions.text: Prepare your vegetables: chop the cabbage, dice the onion, slice the cucumber, and chop the carrots.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 1

recipeInstructions.text: In a large bowl, combine the chopped cabbage, diced onion, sliced cucumber, and chopped carrots.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: Cut the roasted turkey breast into bite-sized pieces and add to the bowl with the vegetables.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: Toss all the ingredients together until well mixed. If desired, add your favorite low-carb dressing to enhance the flavor.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4
